def main():
	numbers = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
	print(1) if len(set(numbers)) == len(numbers) else print(0)

main()

import numpy as np

def main():
    a = np.array(list(map(int, input().split())))
    a = np.sort(a)[::-1]
    print(np.sum(a[::2]) - np.sum(a[1::2]))
    
main()
